response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value to us at $1,000,000, reflecting its quality, innovation, and exclusivity. We are extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $950,000, aiming to make this exceptional acquisition more accessible while ensuring we receive a fair return for our investment. We believe this is a mutually beneficial arrangement that will allow you to enjoy the full benefits of our product without compromising on its value. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer within the next 48 hours.", "product_price": 950000}
